last_episode_to_air.name: I Am Ruth
last_episode_to_air.overview: In a story for our times, concerned mother Ruth (Kate Winslet) witnesses her teenage daughter Freya (Mia Threapleton) retreating into herself as she becomes consumed by the pressures of social media.

name: I Am...
overview: Each hour-long film follows a different woman as they experience “moments that are emotionally raw, thought-provoking and utterly personal”.

episodes.name: I Am Nicola
episodes.overview: Hairdresser Nicola is searching for her romantic ideal, but she's stuck in a coercive relationship with her partner Adam.

episodes.name: I Am Kirsty
episodes.overview: Kirsty is struggling to keep afloat and protect her two young daughters. Working as a cleaner, she is having difficulties paying off debts and, after a frank conversation with a colleague, she contemplates sex work as a means of earning money. The film explores the sacrifices she makes for her family — and how far she’s willing to go to ensure their survival.

episodes.name: I Am Hannah
episodes.overview: Hannah, a woman in her mid-thirties, reaches a crossroads in her life. Facing impediments both within and beyond her control, Hannah is confronted by a crisis of aspiration and identity.

episodes.name: I Am Victoria
episodes.overview: Victoria seems to have a perfect family, job and home. But beneath the veneer of happiness, something is wrong.

episodes.name: I Am Danielle
episodes.overview: Career-driven Danielle falls for model Michael. But then Danielle discovers a disturbing secret.

episodes.name: I Am Maria
episodes.overview: Maria's 60th sparks clarity about her feelings of discontent.

episodes.name: I Am Ruth
episodes.overview: In a story for our times, concerned mother Ruth (Kate Winslet) witnesses her teenage daughter Freya (Mia Threapleton) retreating into herself as she becomes consumed by the pressures of social media.
